name: Conniving
description:
Once per turn, choose one mode:
- Pay 4 SP to cast a Guile spell that deals no damage and restores no HP without ending this unit’s turn.
- Pay 6 SP to initiate combat without ending this unit’s turn after combat. During combat, this unit’s attacks deal no damage.

modifiers.spcost: bothif not(unit|total|mttype == mttype|none and (unit|total|mt)) then 6 else 4 end

comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
